fields.plot: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.
fields.title: Don Jon

fields.plot: A re-creation of the merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
fields.title: Rush

fields.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?
fields.title: Prisoners

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.
fields.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire

fields.plot: Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.
fields.title: Thor: The Dark World

fields.plot: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.
fields.title: This Is the End

fields.plot: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
fields.title: Insidious: Chapter 2

fields.plot: United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.
fields.title: World War Z

fields.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant kind.
fields.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past

fields.plot: A mechanic and his daughter make a discovery that brings down Autobots and Decepticons - and a paranoid government official - on them.
fields.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction

fields.plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
fields.title: Now You See Me

fields.plot: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.
fields.title: Gravity

fields.plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
fields.title: We're the Millers

fields.plot: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

fields.plot: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.

fields.plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.

fields.plot: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

fields.plot: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.
fields.title: The Great Gatsby

fields.plot: The story of a young lesbian couple's beginning, middle and possible end.
fields.title: La vie d'Adèle

fields.plot: Beatrice Prior, a teenager with a special mind, finds her life threatened when an authoritarian leader seeks to exterminate her kind in her effort to seize control of their divided society.
fields.title: Divergent

fields.plot: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

fields.plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
fields.title: Iron Man 3

fields.plot: Spider-Man squares off against the Rhino and the powerful Electro while struggling to keep his promise to leave Gwen Stacey out of his dangerous life.
fields.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

fields.plot: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.
fields.title: Curse of Chucky

fields.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
fields.title: The Conjuring

fields.plot: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked up into solitary confinement for 20 years without reason.
fields.title: Oldboy

fields.plot: When a structural-security authority finds himself incarcerated in a prison he designed, he has to put his skills to escape and find out who framed him.
fields.title: Escape Plan

fields.plot: Set in the year 2154, where the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth, a man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
fields.title: Elysium

fields.plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

fields.plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

fields.plot: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and teams up with Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, to battle a powerful yet shadowy enemy in present-day Washington, D.C.

fields.plot: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.

fields.plot: Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted.

fields.plot: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.
fields.title: No se Aceptan Devoluciones

fields.plot: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.
fields.title: The Bling Ring

fields.plot: Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.
fields.title: Furious 6

fields.plot: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
fields.title: Machete Kills

fields.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

fields.plot: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.
fields.title: The World's End

fields.plot: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

fields.plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superhumans to save the planet from Loki and his army.
fields.title: The Avengers

fields.plot: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.

fields.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
fields.title: Oblivion

fields.plot: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.
fields.title: Dom Hemingway

fields.plot: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the lam.

fields.plot: The costumed high-school hero Kick-Ass joins with a group of normal citizens who have been inspired to fight crime in costume. Meanwhile, the Red Mist plots an act of revenge that will affect everyone Kick-Ass knows.
fields.title: Kick-Ass 2

fields.plot: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.
fields.title: Diana

fields.plot: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.
fields.title: Despicable Me 2

fields.plot: As Cecil Gaines serves eight presidents during his tenure as a butler at the White House, the civil rights movement, Vietnam, and other major events affect this man's life, family, and American society.
fields.title: The Butler

fields.plot: 20 years after the dimwits set out on their first adventure, they head out in search of one of their long lost children in the hope of gaining a new kidney.
fields.title: Dumb and Dumber To

fields.plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...
fields.title: Blue Jasmine

fields.plot: 70 years after a horrific alien war, an unusually gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for a future invasion.
fields.title: Ender's Game

fields.plot: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.
fields.title: White House Down

fields.plot: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.
fields.title: Pain & Gain

fields.plot: After Dominic Toretto and his crew helped take down Owen Shaw, his brother Ian Shaw now wants revenge.
fields.title: Fast & Furious 7

fields.plot: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.
fields.title: jOBS

fields.plot: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.
fields.title: Disconnect

fields.plot: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.
fields.title: Bridesmaids

fields.plot: A young itinerant worker is forced to confront his secret extraterrestrial heritage when Earth is invaded by members of his race.
fields.title: Man of Steel

fields.plot: Two roommates deathly afraid of ghosts both fall in love with a girl who believes their home is haunted.
fields.title: Ghost Team One

fields.plot: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
fields.title: Insidious

fields.plot: A giant radioactive monster called Godzilla awakens from its slumber to wreak destruction on its creators.
fields.title: Godzilla

fields.plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.
fields.title: Wreck-It Ralph

fields.plot: The Dwarves, Bilbo and Gandalf have successfully escaped the Misty Mountains, and Bilbo has gained the One Ring. They all continue their journey to get their gold back from the Dragon, Smaug.
fields.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

fields.title: Frozen

fields.title: Spring Breakers

fields.plot: A literature student Anastasia Steele meets a handsome, yet tormented, billionaire named Christian Grey.
fields.title: Fifty Shades of Grey

fields.plot: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.
fields.title: R.I.P.D.

fields.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption

fields.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to compete.
fields.title: The Hunger Games

fields.title: The Last Days on Mars

fields.title: Baggage Claim

fields.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters

fields.plot: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.
fields.title: Byzantium

fields.plot: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start world war III.
fields.title: X-Men: First Class

fields.title: Hocus Pocus

fields.plot: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.
fields.title: The East

fields.plot: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.
fields.title: V/H/S/2

fields.plot: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.
fields.title: The Croods

fields.title: Hummingbird

fields.title: Mud

fields.title: Argo

fields.title: Django Unchained

fields.title: Grown Ups 2

fields.plot: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.
fields.title: The Dark Knight

fields.plot: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.
fields.title: Planes

fields.plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.
fields.title: The Little Mermaid

fields.plot: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
fields.title: Before Midnight

fields.plot: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record -- a
The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?
fields.title: The Lords of Salem

fields.plot: In an alternate 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.
fields.title: Watchmen

fields.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
fields.title: Saving Private Ryan

fields.plot: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.
fields.title: X-Men: The Last Stand

fields.plot: As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.
fields.title: Lincoln

fields.plot: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier. They reach a fragile peace, but it proves short-lived, as both sides are brought to the brink of a war that will determine who will emerge as Earth's dominant species.
fields.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes

fields.plot: When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.
fields.title: Pee-wee's Big Adventure

fields.plot: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.
fields.title: Something Borrowed

fields.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.
fields.title: Cidade de Deus

fields.plot: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.
fields.title: Savages

fields.plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.
fields.title: Sleepy Hollow

fields.plot: A young girl's
birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.
fields.title: Sixteen Candles

fields.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
fields.title: There Will Be Blood

fields.plot: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.
fields.title: Rise of the Guardians

fields.plot: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm home movies films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.
fields.title: Sinister

fields.plot: A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.
fields.title: The Goonies

fields.plot: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.
fields.title: Beautiful Creatures

fields.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
fields.title: Oldeuboi

fields.plot: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

fields.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
fields.title: Good Will Hunting

fields.plot: 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
fields.title: Alice in Wonderland

fields.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.
fields.title: Troy

fields.plot: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.
fields.title: Shooter

fields.plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
fields.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

fields.plot: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.
fields.title: Dark Shadows

fields.plot: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
fields.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

fields.plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.
fields.title: Sucker Punch

fields.plot: Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.
fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

fields.plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.
fields.title: Scary MoVie

fields.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
fields.title: American History X

fields.plot: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.
fields.title: The Usual Suspects

fields.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.
fields.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

fields.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

fields.plot: The town's most hard boiled citizens cross paths with some of its more reviled inhabitants.
fields.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For

fields.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.
fields.title: Scarface

fields.plot: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.
fields.title: A Clockwork Orange

fields.plot: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.
fields.title: Grudge Match

fields.plot: An office worker who lives inside fantasy worlds where he gets to live an adventurous life while romancing his co-worker sets off a global journey to fix things when both of their jobs are threatened.
fields.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

fields.plot: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as
uses guerrilla tactics to fight against his terrorist, totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
fields.title: V for Vendetta

fields.plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
fields.title: Pineapple Express

fields.plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
fields.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow One

fields.plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
fields.title: Memento

fields.plot: In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.
fields.title: Shame

fields.plot: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
fields.title: Europa Report

fields.plot: An American girl on holiday in the English countryside with her family finds herself in hiding and fighting for her survival as the third world war breaks out.
fields.title: How I Live Now

fields.plot: An alien seductress preys upon hitchhikers in Scotland.
fields.title: Under the Skin

fields.plot: Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.
fields.title: Cloverfield

fields.plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the 1970s and 1980s.
fields.title: Boogie Nights

fields.plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
fields.title: Easy A

fields.plot: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash vengeance upon the corrupt businessman who slew his family.
fields.title: The Punisher

fields.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
fields.title: Lo imposible

fields.plot: A professional assassin rescues a young girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.
fields.title: Léon

fields.plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.
fields.title: Dead Poets Society

fields.plot: The Biblical Noah suffers visions of an apocalyptic deluge, and takes measures to protect his family from the coming flood.
fields.title: Noah

fields.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
fields.title: Tangled

fields.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the cofounder who was later squeezed out of the business.
