fields.title: Paul

fields.plot: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.
fields.title: American Psycho

fields.plot: A woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer against 1990s Pittsburgh backdrop.
fields.title: Love & Other Drugs

fields.plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
fields.title: About Last Night

fields.plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.
fields.title: The Emperor's New Groove

fields.plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.
fields.title: Jack the Giant Slayer

fields.plot: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.
fields.title: Nymphomaniac

fields.plot: With the aid of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.
fields.title: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan

fields.plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
fields.title: Heat

fields.plot: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
fields.title: 10 Things I Hate About You

fields.plot: While trying to avoid the clichés of Hollywood romantic comedies, Dylan and Jamie soon discover however that adding the act of sex to their friendship does lead to complications.
fields.title: Friends with Benefits

fields.plot: After three years of fighting in the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker falls prey to the Sith Lord's lies and makes an enemy of the Jedi and those he loves, concluding his journey to the Dark Side.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

fields.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
fields.title: No Country for Old Men

fields.plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. But when they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
fields.title: Grease

fields.plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100 percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.
fields.title: Limitless

fields.plot: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, and a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the Last Twinkie and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.
fields.title: Zombieland

fields.plot: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.
fields.title: Shutter Island

fields.plot: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.
fields.title: Lilo & Stitch

fields.plot: An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.
fields.title: Blue Caprice

fields.plot: Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis, and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.
Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 70's, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.
fields.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy

fields.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
fields.title: How to Train Your Dragon

fields.plot: Two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- find their unlikely friendship turn tense with one of them reveals their true intentions.
fields.title: Killing Season

fields.plot: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out and find them.
fields.title: Moonrise Kingdom

fields.plot: The fifth installment of the blockbuster franchise that follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales

fields.plot: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.
fields.title: Identity Thief

fields.plot: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

fields.plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
fields.title: RoboCop

fields.plot: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous, given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his wooden leg, and they met and fell in love at a cancer support group.
fields.title: The Fault in Our Stars

fields.plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.
fields.title: Inside Man

fields.plot: When two poor greasers, Johnny, and Ponyboy are assaulted by a vicious gang, the socs, and Johnny kills one of the attackers, tension begins to mount between the two rival gangs, setting off a turbulent chain of events.
fields.title: The Outsiders

fields.plot: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
fields.title: 47 Ronin

fields.plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.
fields.title: Burlesque

fields.plot: Transplanted to Mars, a Civil War vet discovers a lush planet inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself a prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter a princess who is in desperate need of a savior.
fields.title: John Carter

fields.plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
fields.title: Pretty in Pink

fields.plot: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.
fields.title: All Is Lost

fields.plot: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
fields.title: 12 Angry Men

fields.plot: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.
fields.title: V/H/S

fields.plot: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Weapon and the impact it will have on his later years.
fields.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

fields.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
fields.title: Snatch.

fields.plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Man's best weapon is the will to survive.
fields.title: Independence Day

fields.plot: Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships -- and whether they can stay alive.
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
fields.title: Romeo + Juliet

fields.plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.
fields.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

fields.plot: Former race-car driver Brent Magna is pitted against the clock when his wife is kidnapped by a mysterious villain. He commandeers a young woman's car and takes her on on a high-speed race against time.
fields.title: Getaway

fields.plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.
fields.title: Hooligans

fields.plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
fields.title: Total Recall

fields.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.
fields.title: 28 Weeks Later

fields.plot: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
fields.title: Reservoir Dogs

fields.plot: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.
fields.title: Dazed and Confused

fields.plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
fields.title: Spider-Man

fields.plot: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.
fields.title: The Covenant

fields.plot: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.
fields.title: Battleship

fields.plot: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
fields.title: Ocean's Eleven

fields.plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.
fields.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi

fields.plot: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.
fields.title: The Inbetweeners Movie

fields.plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
fields.title: The Fast and the Furious

fields.plot: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.
fields.title: Ruby Sparks

fields.plot: As students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young flyer learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
fields.title: Top Gun

fields.plot: The story of Olympic Wrestling Champion Mark Schultz and how paranoid schizophrenic John duPont killed his brother, Olympic Champion Dave Schultz.
fields.title: Foxcatcher

fields.plot: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor is dead, and another T-101 must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator, the T-1000.
fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

fields.plot: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.
fields.title: Man on Fire

fields.plot: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.
fields.title: Brokeback Mountain

fields.plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
fields.title: Stand by Me

fields.plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.
fields.title: Midnight in Paris

fields.plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.
fields.title: The Vow

fields.plot: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.
fields.title: Snitch

fields.plot: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.
fields.title: Broken City

fields.plot: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.
fields.title: Fast Five

fields.plot: The space vessel Nostromo and its crew receive a distress call from a alien planet. After searching for survivors that planet they head back home only to realize that an deadly alien life form has joined them.
fields.title: Alien

fields.plot: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.
fields.title: Abduction

fields.plot: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
fields.title: The Blind Side

fields.plot: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.
fields.title: 21 & Over

fields.plot: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?
fields.title: Pride & Prejudice

fields.plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
fields.title: Transformers

fields.plot: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.
fields.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

fields.plot: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.
fields.title: Dark Skies

fields.plot: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.
fields.title: That's My Boy

fields.plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
fields.title: Seven Psychopaths

fields.plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.
fields.title: I Am Number Four

fields.plot: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.
fields.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

fields.plot: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
fields.title: Million Dollar Baby

fields.plot: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
fields.title: Apocalypse Now

fields.plot: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
fields.title: Men in Black 3

fields.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
fields.title: Trainspotting

fields.plot: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
fields.title: Fast & Furious

fields.plot: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.
fields.title: Knocked Up

fields.plot: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.
fields.title: The Company You Keep

fields.plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.
fields.title: War of the Worlds

fields.plot: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.
fields.title: A Beautiful Mind

fields.plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.
fields.title: King Arthur

fields.plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.
fields.title: Red Dawn

fields.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.
fields.title: Red

fields.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
fields.title: The Godfather: Part II

fields.plot: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.
fields.title: Melancholia

fields.plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
fields.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

fields.plot: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.
fields.title: Immortals

fields.plot: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
fields.title: Zodiac

fields.plot: When a street magician's stunts begins to make their show look stale, superstar magicians Burt Wonderstone and Anton Marvelton look to salvage on their act - and their friendship - by staging their own daring stunt.
fields.title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone

fields.plot: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
fields.title: Taken

fields.plot: While subjected to the horrors of WWII Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. Under the stairs in her home, a Jewish refuge is being sheltered by her adoptive parents.
fields.title: The Book Thief

fields.plot: Dave is a married man with two kids and a loving wife , and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain when lightning strikes and they switch bodies.
fields.title: The Change-Up

fields.plot: While out on parole, Dennis reluctantly takes a job selling Christmas trees with his old buddy Rene in order to make enough money to buy his estranged daughter the piano she's always wanted.
fields.title: All Is Bright

fields.plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
fields.title: The Master

fields.plot: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.
fields.title: One Day

fields.plot: After Vishwas Rao (Shahid Kapoor) is raised up by his Mother (Padmini Kolhapure), who apparently dreams for him to become a Police Inspector. However, he has different plans in mind. Vishwas wants to become a film hero.
fields.title: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero

fields.plot: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?
fields.title: Enchanted

fields.plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

fields.plot: The story of three friends who are tragically born to lead short lives, and the love triangle that forms between them in their brief time together.
fields.title: Never Let Me Go

fields.plot: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
fields.title: X-Men

fields.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
fields.title: Toy Story 3

fields.plot: A 18th century adventure story centered on young Thomas, who is apprenticed to the local Spook to learn to fight evil spirits. His first great challenge comes when the powerful Mother Malkin escapes her confinement while the Spook is away.
fields.title: Seventh Son

fields.plot: A land baron tries to re-connect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.
fields.title: The Descendants

fields.plot: In a race against time, a crew of art historians and museum curators unite to recover renowned works of art stolen by Nazis before Hitler destroys them.
fields.title: The Monuments Men

fields.plot: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.
fields.title: Unknown

fields.plot: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement fails to follow through, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.
fields.title: Out of the Furnace

fields.plot: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.
fields.title: The To Do List

fields.plot: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
fields.title: The Ring

fields.plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never
only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
fields.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

fields.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
fields.title: The Road

fields.plot: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
fields.title: Project X

fields.plot: Set in the near future, where robot boxing is a top sport, a struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot. During his hopeful rise to the top, he discovers he has an 11-year-old son who wants to know his father.
fields.title: Real Steel

fields.plot: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.
fields.title: Enemy

fields.plot: An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together.
fields.title: The Lego Movie

fields.plot: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.
fields.title: Big Fish

fields.plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
fields.title: Just Go with It

fields.plot: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.
fields.title: Yi dai zong shi

fields.plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
fields.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol

fields.plot: When the devil possesses a teenage girl, her only hope is an exorcism.
fields.title: The Exorcist

fields.plot: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
fields.title: Brave

fields.plot: A group of explorers make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
fields.title: Interstellar

fields.plot: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.
fields.title: Hot Fuzz

fields.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

fields.plot: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
fields.title: Shaun of the Dead

fields.plot: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
fields.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1

fields.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
fields.title: The Sixth Sense

fields.plot: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.
fields.title: LOL

fields.plot: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.
fields.title: Monsters, Inc.

fields.plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.
fields.title: The Little Mermaid

fields.plot: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.
fields.title: Before Midnight

fields.plot: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record -- a
The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?
fields.title: The Lords of Salem

fields.plot: In an alternate 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.
fields.title: Watchmen

fields.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
fields.title: Saving Private Ryan

fields.plot: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.
fields.title: X-Men: The Last Stand

fields.plot: As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.
fields.title: Lincoln

fields.plot: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier. They reach a fragile peace, but it proves short-lived, as both sides are brought to the brink of a war that will determine who will emerge as Earth's dominant species.
fields.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes

fields.plot: When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.
fields.title: Pee-wee's Big Adventure

fields.plot: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.
fields.title: Something Borrowed

fields.plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.
fields.title: Cidade de Deus

fields.plot: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.
fields.title: Savages

fields.plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.
fields.title: Sleepy Hollow

fields.plot: A young girl's
birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.
fields.title: Sixteen Candles

fields.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
fields.title: There Will Be Blood

fields.plot: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.
fields.title: Rise of the Guardians

fields.plot: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm home movies films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.
fields.title: Sinister

fields.plot: A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.
fields.title: The Goonies

fields.plot: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.
fields.title: Beautiful Creatures

fields.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
fields.title: Oldeuboi

fields.plot: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

fields.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
fields.title: Good Will Hunting

fields.plot: 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
fields.title: Alice in Wonderland

fields.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.
fields.title: Troy

fields.plot: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.
fields.title: Shooter

fields.plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
fields.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

fields.plot: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.
fields.title: Dark Shadows

fields.plot: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
fields.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

fields.plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.
fields.title: Sucker Punch

fields.plot: Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.
fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

fields.plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.
fields.title: Scary MoVie

fields.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
fields.title: American History X

fields.plot: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.
fields.title: The Usual Suspects

fields.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.
fields.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

fields.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

fields.plot: The town's most hard boiled citizens cross paths with some of its more reviled inhabitants.
fields.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For

fields.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.
fields.title: Scarface

fields.plot: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.
fields.title: A Clockwork Orange

fields.plot: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.
fields.title: Grudge Match

fields.plot: An office worker who lives inside fantasy worlds where he gets to live an adventurous life while romancing his co-worker sets off a global journey to fix things when both of their jobs are threatened.
fields.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

fields.plot: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as
uses guerrilla tactics to fight against his terrorist, totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
fields.title: V for Vendetta

fields.plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
fields.title: Pineapple Express

fields.plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
fields.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow One

fields.plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
fields.title: Memento

fields.plot: In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.
fields.title: Shame

fields.plot: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
fields.title: Europa Report

fields.plot: An American girl on holiday in the English countryside with her family finds herself in hiding and fighting for her survival as the third world war breaks out.
fields.title: How I Live Now

fields.plot: An alien seductress preys upon hitchhikers in Scotland.
fields.title: Under the Skin

fields.plot: Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.
fields.title: Cloverfield

fields.plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the 1970s and 1980s.
fields.title: Boogie Nights

fields.plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
fields.title: Easy A

fields.plot: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash vengeance upon the corrupt businessman who slew his family.
fields.title: The Punisher

fields.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
fields.title: Lo imposible

fields.plot: A professional assassin rescues a young girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.
fields.title: Léon

fields.plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.
fields.title: Dead Poets Society

fields.plot: The Biblical Noah suffers visions of an apocalyptic deluge, and takes measures to protect his family from the coming flood.
fields.title: Noah

fields.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
fields.title: Tangled

fields.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the cofounder who was later squeezed out of the business.
fields.title: The Social Network

fields.plot: Two British comic-book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.
fields.title: Paul

fields.plot: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.
fields.title: American Psycho

fields.plot: A woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer against 1990s Pittsburgh backdrop.
fields.title: Love & Other Drugs

fields.plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
fields.title: About Last Night

fields.plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.
fields.title: The Emperor's New Groove

fields.plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.
fields.title: Jack the Giant Slayer

fields.plot: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.
fields.title: Nymphomaniac

fields.plot: With the aid of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.
fields.title: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan

fields.plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
fields.title: Heat

fields.plot: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
fields.title: 10 Things I Hate About You

fields.plot: While trying to avoid the clichés of Hollywood romantic comedies, Dylan and Jamie soon discover however that adding the act of sex to their friendship does lead to complications.
fields.title: Friends with Benefits

fields.plot: After three years of fighting in the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker falls prey to the Sith Lord's lies and makes an enemy of the Jedi and those he loves, concluding his journey to the Dark Side.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

fields.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
fields.title: No Country for Old Men

fields.plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. But when they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
fields.title: Grease

fields.plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100 percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.
fields.title: Limitless

fields.plot: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, and a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the Last Twinkie and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.
fields.title: Zombieland

fields.plot: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.
fields.title: Shutter Island

fields.plot: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.
fields.title: Lilo & Stitch

fields.plot: An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.
fields.title: Blue Caprice

fields.plot: Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis, and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.
Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 70's, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.
fields.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy

fields.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
fields.title: How to Train Your Dragon

fields.plot: Two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- find their unlikely friendship turn tense with one of them reveals their true intentions.
fields.title: Killing Season

fields.plot: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out and find them.
fields.title: Moonrise Kingdom

fields.plot: The fifth installment of the blockbuster franchise that follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales

fields.plot: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.
fields.title: Identity Thief

fields.plot: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

fields.plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
fields.title: RoboCop

fields.plot: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous, given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his wooden leg, and they met and fell in love at a cancer support group.
fields.title: The Fault in Our Stars

fields.plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.
fields.title: Inside Man

fields.plot: When two poor greasers, Johnny, and Ponyboy are assaulted by a vicious gang, the socs, and Johnny kills one of the attackers, tension begins to mount between the two rival gangs, setting off a turbulent chain of events.
fields.title: The Outsiders

fields.plot: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
fields.title: 47 Ronin

fields.plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.
fields.title: Burlesque

fields.plot: Transplanted to Mars, a Civil War vet discovers a lush planet inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself a prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter a princess who is in desperate need of a savior.
fields.title: John Carter

fields.plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
fields.title: Pretty in Pink

fields.plot: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.
fields.title: All Is Lost

fields.plot: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
fields.title: 12 Angry Men

fields.plot: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.
fields.title: V/H/S

fields.plot: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Weapon and the impact it will have on his later years.
fields.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

fields.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
fields.title: Snatch.

fields.plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Man's best weapon is the will to survive.
fields.title: Independence Day

fields.plot: Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships -- and whether they can stay alive.
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
fields.title: Romeo + Juliet

fields.plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.
fields.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

fields.plot: Former race-car driver Brent Magna is pitted against the clock when his wife is kidnapped by a mysterious villain. He commandeers a young woman's car and takes her on on a high-speed race against time.
fields.title: Getaway

fields.plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.
fields.title: Hooligans

fields.plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
fields.title: Total Recall

fields.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.
fields.title: 28 Weeks Later

fields.plot: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
fields.title: Reservoir Dogs

fields.plot: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.
fields.title: Dazed and Confused

fields.plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
fields.title: Spider-Man

fields.plot: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.
fields.title: The Covenant

fields.plot: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.
fields.title: Battleship

fields.plot: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
fields.title: Ocean's Eleven

fields.plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.
fields.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi

fields.plot: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.
fields.title: The Inbetweeners Movie

fields.plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
fields.title: The Fast and the Furious

fields.plot: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.
fields.title: Ruby Sparks

fields.plot: As students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young flyer learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
fields.title: Top Gun

fields.plot: The story of Olympic Wrestling Champion Mark Schultz and how paranoid schizophrenic John duPont killed his brother, Olympic Champion Dave Schultz.
fields.title: Foxcatcher

fields.plot: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor is dead, and another T-101 must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator, the T-1000.
fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

fields.plot: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.
fields.title: Man on Fire

fields.plot: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.
fields.title: Brokeback Mountain

fields.plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
fields.title: Stand by Me

fields.plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.
fields.title: Midnight in Paris

fields.plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.
fields.title: The Vow

fields.plot: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.
fields.title: Snitch

fields.plot: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.
fields.title: Broken City

fields.plot: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.
fields.title: Fast Five

fields.plot: The space vessel Nostromo and its crew receive a distress call from a alien planet. After searching for survivors that planet they head back home only to realize that an deadly alien life form has joined them.
fields.title: Alien

fields.plot: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.
fields.title: Abduction

fields.plot: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
fields.title: The Blind Side

fields.plot: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.
fields.title: 21 & Over

fields.plot: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?
fields.title: Pride & Prejudice

fields.plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
fields.title: Transformers

fields.plot: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.
fields.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

fields.plot: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.
fields.title: Dark Skies

fields.plot: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.
fields.title: That's My Boy

fields.plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
fields.title: Seven Psychopaths

fields.plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.
fields.title: I Am Number Four

fields.plot: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.
fields.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

fields.plot: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
fields.title: Million Dollar Baby

fields.plot: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
fields.title: Apocalypse Now

fields.plot: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
fields.title: Men in Black 3

fields.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
fields.title: Trainspotting

fields.plot: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
fields.title: Fast & Furious

fields.plot: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.
fields.title: Knocked Up

fields.plot: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.
fields.title: The Company You Keep

fields.plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.
fields.title: War of the Worlds

fields.plot: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.
fields.title: A Beautiful Mind

fields.plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.
fields.title: King Arthur

fields.plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.
fields.title: Red Dawn

fields.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.
fields.title: Red

fields.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
fields.title: The Godfather: Part II

fields.plot: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.
fields.title: Melancholia

fields.plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
fields.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

fields.plot: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.
fields.title: Immortals

fields.plot: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
fields.title: Zodiac

fields.plot: When a street magician's stunts begins to make their show look stale, superstar magicians Burt Wonderstone and Anton Marvelton look to salvage on their act - and their friendship - by staging their own daring stunt.
fields.title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone

fields.plot: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
fields.title: Taken

fields.plot: While subjected to the horrors of WWII Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. Under the stairs in her home, a Jewish refuge is being sheltered by her adoptive parents.
fields.title: The Book Thief

fields.plot: Dave is a married man with two kids and a loving wife , and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain when lightning strikes and they switch bodies.
fields.title: The Change-Up

fields.plot: While out on parole, Dennis reluctantly takes a job selling Christmas trees with his old buddy Rene in order to make enough money to buy his estranged daughter the piano she's always wanted.
fields.title: All Is Bright

fields.plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
fields.title: The Master

fields.plot: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.
fields.title: One Day

fields.plot: After Vishwas Rao (Shahid Kapoor) is raised up by his Mother (Padmini Kolhapure), who apparently dreams for him to become a Police Inspector. However, he has different plans in mind. Vishwas wants to become a film hero.
fields.title: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero

fields.plot: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?
fields.title: Enchanted

fields.plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

fields.plot: The story of three friends who are tragically born to lead short lives, and the love triangle that forms between them in their brief time together.
fields.title: Never Let Me Go

fields.plot: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
fields.title: X-Men

fields.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
fields.title: Toy Story 3

fields.plot: A 18th century adventure story centered on young Thomas, who is apprenticed to the local Spook to learn to fight evil spirits. His first great challenge comes when the powerful Mother Malkin escapes her confinement while the Spook is away.
fields.title: Seventh Son

fields.plot: A land baron tries to re-connect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.
fields.title: The Descendants

fields.plot: In a race against time, a crew of art historians and museum curators unite to recover renowned works of art stolen by Nazis before Hitler destroys them.
fields.title: The Monuments Men

fields.plot: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.
fields.title: Unknown

fields.plot: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement fails to follow through, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.
fields.title: Out of the Furnace

fields.plot: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.
fields.title: The To Do List

fields.plot: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
fields.title: The Ring

fields.plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never
only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
fields.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

fields.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
fields.title: The Road

fields.plot: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
fields.title: Project X

fields.plot: Set in the near future, where robot boxing is a top sport, a struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot. During his hopeful rise to the top, he discovers he has an 11-year-old son who wants to know his father.
fields.title: Real Steel

fields.plot: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.
fields.title: Enemy

fields.plot: An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together.
fields.title: The Lego Movie

fields.plot: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.
fields.title: Big Fish

fields.plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
fields.title: Just Go with It

fields.plot: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.
fields.title: Yi dai zong shi

fields.plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
fields.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol

fields.plot: When the devil possesses a teenage girl, her only hope is an exorcism.
fields.title: The Exorcist

fields.plot: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
fields.title: Brave

fields.plot: A group of explorers make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
fields.title: Interstellar

fields.plot: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.
fields.title: Hot Fuzz

fields.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

fields.plot: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
fields.title: Shaun of the Dead

fields.plot: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge

He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

They need a dose of what only the eternally bubbly Shelley can provide... but they will each learn on their own to stop pretending to be what others want them to be and start being themselves.
